import React from 'react' const CreatePostForm = ({ currentUser, post }) => { const [formValues, setFormValues] = useState({ title: currentUser.title, text: currentUser,text }) const handleChange = (e) => { setFormValues({ ...formValues, [e.target.id]: e.target.value }) } return (

Image

{post.text}

) } export default CreatePostForm
